title: Did a Kentucky Lawmaker Introduce a Bill Requiring Men to Get Wives’ Permission to Take Viagra?
subtitle: Rep. Mary Lou Marzian, who is also a registered nurse, joked that she introduced the tongue-in-cheek 2016 legislation 'to protect these men from themselves.'
author: David Emery
vclaim: A 2016 bill before the Kentucky legislature would have required men to get their wives' permission before obtaining a prescription for Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drug.
